scripts.install:all: concurrently "npm install" "cd backend && npm install" "cd frontend && pnpm install"
scripts.copy:env: cp -n backend/.env.example backend/.env && cp -n frontend/.env.example frontend/.env || true
scripts.init:project: npm run copy:env && npm run install:all && cd backend && npx prisma generate
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && pnpm dev"
